detail_desc: Short wrap dress in jersey with a slight sheen. Elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Pile-lined jacket in imitation suede with a pile-lined stand-up collar with a fastening. Zip down the front and open front pockets.

Shirt in a supersoft cotton weave with a turn-down collar that has a contrasting colour trim. Buttons down the front, yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with short, lace-trimmed sleeves.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with mesh details, a racer back and wide elasticated hem. Lined at the front. Medium support.
Two-button jacket in a textured weave with notch lapels, a fake pocket at the top, welt front pockets with a flap, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Dressing gown in sweatshirt fabric with a hood, long sleeves, tie belt at the waist and narrow ribbing around the front, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Adjustable elastic braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details.
Long-sleeved bodysuit in soft cotton jersey with woven details, a collar and button placket. Chest pocket with a button on the front, buttoned cuffs and press-studs at the crotch.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck and a flounce at the top. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Long satin dress with a V-neck at the front, concealed zip at the back and cap sleeves. Seam with pleats at the waist and a wrapover skirt with high slits in the sides. Double-layered bodice and an unlined skirt.

Shirt in an airy viscose weave with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Flared, calf-length skirt in patterned cotton. High waist with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip in one side. Unlined.

Short V-neck dress in plumeti chiffon with gathers and a small frill at the shoulders, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist and a bell-shaped skirt with frilled tiers. Lined.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with welded seams. Detachable hood with an elastic drawstring, press-studs down the front and reflective details. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.

Wrapover blouse in a crinkled weave made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. Short, puffy raglan sleeves with gathers along the shoulder seams and narrow elastication at the hems. Seam at the waist with visible ties at one side and concealed ties at the other. Lined.
Playsuit in glittery slub jersey. Opening with a button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow, side pockets and short legs.

Sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric with wide shoulder straps and lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust. Racer back with a cut-out detail. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Medium support.
Thin metal chain necklace with a leaf-shaped pendant. Adjustable length, 88-96 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Hi-tops in imitation leather and sturdy mesh with a padded top edge, adjustable hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short dress in a soft rib knit containing some wool. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Four pairs of earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 2.3 cm to 4.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
Jersey top in a soft modal and cotton blend with short cap sleeves.
Short, wide top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar and zip at the top. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and a fake fly. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.

Set with a shirt in a cotton weave, bow tie, and a pair of trousers woven in a linen blend. Shirt with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Bow tie with an adjustable elastic strap and plastic fastener at the back. Trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with fasteners and detachable braces.
Sandals with a wraparound ankle strap with an adjustable fastener, and covered block heels. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 6.5 cm.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with elastication and a decorative, tasselled drawstring at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with short sleeves. Contrasting colour trims around the neckline and sleeves.

Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton, pointelle jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and short puff sleeves. Decorative picot trim around the neckline and sleeves, and press-studs at the crotch.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Nylon jacket with a detachable, jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Chest pocket and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Sleeveless, ribbed jersey jumpsuit in a straight cut at the top with narrow shoulder straps. Seam at the waist and wide, 3/4-length legs. Lined at the top.
Off-the-shoulder top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a slight sheen. Narrow ribbing at the top and short sleeves.
V-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Pyjama top and bottoms in soft cotton jersey. Low-cut top with short sleeves, gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy, and a practical, lace-trimmed inner top for easier nursing access. Leggings with wide, foldover ribbing at the waist that can be adjusted as the tummy grows.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
High-waisted shorts in superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Knee-length shirt dress in a checked viscose weave with a collar, gathered yoke at the back, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem. Unlined.
Boat-neck jumper in a fine knit with buttons on the shoulders, 3/4-length sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Striped top in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Short-sleeved dress in soft organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam and wide flounce at the hem.

Top in crinkled jersey with broderie anglaise. Wide neckline, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Narrow, elasticated seam at the hem with ties at the sides and a flounced trim.
Sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and reflective detail.
A-line blouse in woven fabric with an opening at the back with ties at the back of the neck and long trumpet sleeves.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline.
Sweatshirt in a printed cotton blend with a round neckline, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Knee-length shorts in soft, washed cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Pull-on trousers in a textured linen and cotton weave. Adjustable elasticated waist with a decorative drawstring, zip fly and button, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a seam under the bust and long trumpet sleeves with slits at the cuffs.
Metal rings in various designs. Four decorated with plastic and glass beads.
Hair elastics without metal clips.
V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with buttons at the top, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with sequins on the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Flat hair elastics in different colours.
Chelsea boots in grained imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Short-sleeved jersey playsuit in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck and sewn-in wrapover at the top and elasticated seam at the waist.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with long sleeves and wide cuffs with slits.
Double-layered headband in a mohair-blend knit with a decorative knot detail at the front.
Short dress in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and a gently flared skirt.
Top in soft, printed sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves, an unlined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, off-the-shoulder dress in jersey crêpe containing some linen with smocking at the top. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, a seam with smocking at the waist and a lined skirt.
Dress in a woven cotton blend with broderie anglaise. Wide tie shoulder straps, a concealed zip in the side and seam at the waist with a flared skirt. Lined.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Long-sleeved jumper in a chunky rib-knit wool blend with low dropped shoulders, cable-knit details at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, V-neck sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with decorative straps at the neckline, short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with an embroidered pattern and embroidered trims. V-neck with ties at the top and long, slightly wider raglan sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, and welt back pockets with a button. Slim fit.
